posts.post_content: Sports pages(4) of August 3, 1862 issue. Has text and box scores from several baseball games and cricket box scores. Of most interest is the box score of the St George v Boston match which featured Harry and George Wright as well as Creighton (Jim Creighton?). If it was Jim Creighton, this was just a few months before his untimely death. $500 or best bid. Please respond to [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]. First payment received gets this item.
